rows.label: qst710203_msg0001
rows.name:
They seem to be swimming around
happily enough...

rows.label: qst710203_msg0002
rows.name:
Yes, indeed!
Spirited enough to match the dauntless
courage of Iiran knights!

rows.label: qst710203_msg0003
rows.name:
The people of the capital will be most
pleased!

rows.label: qst710203_msg0004
rows.name:
Wadatsumi, what do you think about
the fish?

rows.label: qst710203_msg0005
rows.name:
They seem grown enough to eat, 
by my assessment. If I can be so bold,
may I suggest carpaccio?

rows.label: qst710203_msg0007
rows.name:
Terrific! Well then, I'll raise them
carefully so they'll be the prettiest
fish you've ever seen!

rows.label: qst710203_msg0009
rows.name: OK, next up is the front moat.

rows.label: qst710203_msg0010
rows.name:
Used to be full of fish till the Holy Grail
attacked the capital. The moat was
teeming with life.

rows.label: qst710203_msg0011
rows.name:
I know you don't know me or anything,
but I'm really counting on you to help.

rows.label: qst710203_msg0012
rows.name:
Will you catch some fish we can
use to restock the moat?

rows.label: qst710203_msg0013
rows.name:
It'll be such a lift to the atmosphere
of the area if we could get the moat
back to how it used to be.

rows.label: qst710203_msg0014
rows.name: I really do hope you'll be able to help.
